name: NAPIL
description:
Physics sucks! Keep that elephant rolling on his ball against all odds. And bats. And rats.

This game made as part of Scorejam 8, the theme was Balance.

The elephant will tilt to the sides, don't let him fall!

Jump to avoid the rats, but only jump when balanced (or you will fall)!

Puff to push away the bats, but look out! it will push you backwards

A - Tilt Left

D - Tilt Right

Space - Puff

W - Jump

~~~

Pre - Made Assets:

Swing Time - MusicByPedro

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nDDfWDvVROI

AI 2 - Vibe Mountain

Toe Jam - Diamond Ortiz
